main.description: Satellytes is a digital agency that circles around large companies, helping them transform and optimize digital services and interfaces.

services.title: What we offer
services.text: Satellytes - passionate developers and designers. We have great fun with technology and look forward to new challenges. We focus on long-term engagements in the corporate business.

clients.title: Sustainable and modern projects
clients.text: We support large corporations in the implementation of their digital strategies. Find out which clients & industries we work for.

career.title: Work with us
career.text: We are looking for developers with passion! You don't have much work experience yet? No problem. Because everything you need to know, you'll learn with us. You can already do everything? Then you will find new challenges and experienced colleagues at Satellytes with whom you can grow. Take a look at our open positions. We look forward to receiving your application.

career.title: Career
career.subheading: We are looking for passionate developers!
career.headline: Apply now
career.info-text: Please upload relevant files e.g. CV, cover letter or references. You can upload 3 pdf-documents with a maximal size of 20 MB each.

seo.description-detail: Apply now to become a {{name}}! Take a look at our other vacancies. We look forward to receiving your application.
seo.title: Career | Satellytes
seo.description: We are looking for passionate developers! Take a look at our open positions. We look forward to receiving your application.

career.email-confirmation: We sent you a confirmation-email and we will contact you.

process.title: Process
process.introduction: This is how our application process works. We put a lot of emphasis on transparency. You will know at all times how things will proceed and what to expect. Read the following description carefully, then nothing can surprise you.

application.title: Apply
application.text: You have found a job that you are convinced you are the right candidate for? Very good, we are looking forward to hearing from you! You fill in the application form for the job with all the necessary data and files and send it off. Your application will then be sent to us and members of your future team will take a close look at your application. If we are also convinced that you are the right candidate, we will invite you to join us.

interview.title: First interview
interview.text:
This interview is designed to be around 30min to 45min. Someone from our HR department will have a chat with you about your application. You will learn first details about your future project and we will discuss first general conditions with you, for example, when you want to start or your salary expectations.

Once the interview is over, you will hear from us within 2 days about what happens next with us.

knowledge.title: Second interview: Your technical knowledge
knowledge.text:
This interview is the most extensive part of your application and can take up to 120 minutes. You may need to do some preparation. We don't let our applicants write code. Instead, we will go through technical questions with you and you will talk through a code review with us. This helps us assess how good your technical skills are.

 You'll hear back within 2 days about what happens next.

team.title: Getting to know our team
team.text:
Congratulations! You have proven to us that you can do what you promised us. In this last step, you will get to know your future team. We will mainly talk about your soft skills. How did you behave in the past, how did you cope with problems and what do you expect from your working environment and colleagues. 

We want to talk to you at eye level and make sure that you know exactly what is coming up and we want to find out whether you fit in with us not only because of your technical expertise but also because of your personality.

result.title: The result
result.text: When everything has worked out, we will happily send you the news and discuss everything that follows. Your employment contract will be prepared and your start date will be set.

office.heading: Our Office
